attributes.action: Review the administration of fees by the Royal Pharmaceutical Society
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Applying full fees to part-time Pharmacists (including those on maternity leave, retired pharmacists)and increasing it by nearly 40% in one year.  Pharmacists are leaving the society due to this therefore registered pharmacists will have to cover lost revenue in the future, therefore more will leave .........
The old system of a reduced rate for part-time pharmacists is a fairer system and increases not above inflation would be more acceptable.
If pharmacists don't/can't pay and get struck off - who will be able to dispense prescription drugs ??
